--- title: "Supervised ML-Regression" author: "Tommy Weber" --- ### Importing Libraries ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-1_2b6ab6e403d70d5a6b8e37c2595a9abc'} ```{.r .cell-code} library(tidyverse) library(parsnip) library(rsample) library(recipes) library(workflows) library(yardstick) ``` ::: --- ### Defining Model ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-2_059abc28d19817dc3892bab90535a891'} ```{.r .cell-code} lr_mod <- linear_reg(mode = "regression") %>% set_engine("lm") ``` ::: --- ### Loading Data ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-3_693ebed7125084e0109664132283b29f'} ```{.r .cell-code} bike_features_tbl <- readRDS("../../../bike_features_tbl.rds") glimpse(bike_features_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout} ``` #> Rows: 231 #> Columns: 67 #> $ bike_id 2875, 2873, 2874, 2876, 2877, 2225, 2091, … #> $ model "Aeroad CF SL Disc 8.0 Di2", "Aeroad CF SL… #> $ model_year 2020, 2020, 2020, 2020, 2020, 2019, 2019, … #> $ frame_material "carbon", "carbon", "carbon", "carbon", "c… #> $ weight 7.60, 7.27, 7.10, 7.73, 7.83, 6.80, 6.80, … #> $ price 4579, 6919, 6429, 5069, 3609, 6139, 5359, … #> $ category_1 "Road", "Road", "Road", "Road", "Road", "R… #> $ category_2 "Race", "Race", "Race", "Race", "Race", "R… #> $ category_3 "Aeroad", "Aeroad", "Aeroad", "Aeroad", "A… #> $ gender "unisex", "unisex", "unisex", "unisex", "u… #> $ url "https://www.canyon.com/en-de/road-bikes/r… #> $ Frame "Canyon Aeroad CF SL Disc", "Canyon Aeroad… #> $ Fork "Canyon FK0041 CF SLX Disc", "Canyon FK004… #> $ `Rear Derailleur` "Shimano Ultegra Di2 R8050 SS", "SRAM RED … #> $ `Front Derailleur` "Shimano Ultegra Di2 R8050", "SRAM RED eTa… #> $ Cassette "Shimano Ultegra R8000, 11-speed, 11-28T",… #> $ Crank "Shimano Ultegra R8000", "SRAM RED D1", "S… #> $ `Bottom bracket` "Shimano Pressfit BB72", "SRAM Pressfit RE… #> $ `Thru Axle` "Canyon Thru Axle", "Canyon Thru Axle", "C… #> $ Cockpit "Canyon H36 Aerocockpit CF", "Canyon H36 A… #> $ Saddle "Selle Italia SLR", "Selle Italia SLR", "S… #> $ Seatpost "", "", ""… #> $ `Manuals and Accessories 8` "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", "", ""… #> $ `Brake Rotor` "Shimano RT800", "SRAM Centerline X", "Sh… ``` ::: ::: --- ### Splitting Data ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-4_8483f267210ff46d00ce1c03c1b74e96'} ```{.r .cell-code} set.seed(184375) split_obj <- initial_split(bike_features_tbl, prop = 0.8) train_tbl <- training(split_obj) test_tbl <- testing(split_obj) train_tbl <- train_tbl %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(train_tbl), " |-", "_")) test_tbl <- test_tbl %>% set_names(str_replace_all(names(test_tbl), " |-", "_")) ``` ::: --- ### Creating Recipe ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-5_684bc5ffa9139d7dce99cebe19f3c7dc'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes_rec <- recipe(price ~ category_2 + frame_material + weight, data = train_tbl) %>% step_dummy(all_nominal()) ``` ::: --- ### Combining to Workflow ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-6_94c66ba6ef457796b75963b7fa9c6e33'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes_wflow <- workflow() %>% add_model(lr_mod) %>% add_recipe(bikes_rec) ``` ::: --- ### Fitting ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-7_84960fd4077123df5dad6cbec3ef39d3'} ```{.r .cell-code} bikes_fit <- bikes_wflow %>% fit(data = train_tbl) ``` ::: --- ### Evaluation ::: {.cell hash='02_supervised_ml_regression_cache/html/unnamed-chunk-8_f479f2f5649eaad20bb68dd3d37da55e'} ```{.r .cell-code} calc_metrics <- function(model, new_data = test_tbl) { model %>% predict(new_data = new_data) %>% bind_cols(new_data %>% select(price)) %>% yardstick::metrics(truth = price, estimate = .pred) } calc_metrics(bikes_fit, new_data = test_tbl) ``` ::: {.cell-output-display} `````{=html}
````` ::: :::
